title: Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt's children will not be following in their footsteps as actors
text:

Angelina Jolie has shared that not one of her six children have wishes to follow in her or ex husband Brad Pitt's footsteps with their career choices.

The actress, 44, who is mother to Maddox, 18, Pax 15, Zahara, 14, Shiloh, 13, and twins Vivienne and Knox, both 11, has discussed that "fame is not important" to her kids and that they do not want to star in movies.

The Hollywood star also shared how Vivienne, who appeared in the first Disney Maleficent movie with Angelina at the age of four, is "slightly upset" that she starred.

Discussing her children being used to the limelight, Angelina told The Sun: “The good thing is I have wanted them to be exposed to it all, so they don’t feel like it is ­something they are not involved in, that it is not a part of their life.

(Image: Getty Images)

“But fame is not important to them and the centre to their lives in a way that is unhealthy. It is all fun.”

“Viv is still slightly upset with me that I put her as a Princess. She said its going to take a while to live that one down. My kids do not want to be actors.”

It comes after Angelina opened up about what it means to be a good mother and being accepted in a society with "so much oppression and judgement".

(Image: Getty Images for Netflix)

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

The humanitarian spoke to MirrorOnline at the premiere of her new Maleficent film, Mistress of Evil.

Angelina said the film tells us that parenthood "isn't easy", and that a lot of mothers worry about if they are doing a good job, herself included.

Even Maleficent can have trouble and worry whether or not she's a good enough mom, and worry about what it means to be a mum", she said.

(Image: Disney)

"In her mind she has this idea, we probably all do - I know I did before I had kids - that to be a perfect mother you have to be a perfect person. And that's not true."

Instead, Angelina says "you have to just do your best and be willing to put your child before you".

"She loves being a mom, and I do too", she added.

"It's my everything."
description: The actor and actress' children do not have dreams of becoming Hollywood stars
